name: Footprints Festival

config_properties.name: Footprints Festival
config_properties.description: A curated discovery festival at TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, showcasing emerging international artists across diverse genres.

ai_profile:
**Footprints Festival 2026: A Celebration of Diversity and Innovation**

The Footprints Festival 2026 brings together an eclectic mix of 11 artists, spanning a dazzling array of genres and cultural influences. From the hypnotic beats of electronic music to the soulful sounds of Malian desert blues, and from Anatolian rock to minimalist electropop, the festival promises an immersive journey through sound. With a notable average rating of 7.73, the lineup has already garnered high praise, with most artists rated between 8 and 9, signaling a festival of exceptional quality.

This year’s lineup highlights the festival’s commitment to global representation and diversity. Featuring artists from 10 different countries, including Germany, Nigeria, Iran, and Brazil, Footprints Festival is a vibrant celebration of international talent. Over half of the performers identify as people of color, enriching the event with a wide range of cultural narratives. Gender diversity is also represented, with female-fronted acts and mixed-gender groups contributing to the festival’s dynamic energy.

More than just a music festival, Footprints 2026 is a platform for innovation and genre-blending creativity. With a heavy focus on experimental and cross-cultural sounds—such as psychedelic folk, Afrobeat, and traditional Iranian music—this year’s edition underscores the importance of pushing boundaries and finding common ground through music. Whether you’re a fan of jazz, indie pop, or something entirely new, Footprints Festival 2026 promises an unforgettable experience for all.
